title: Binge Eater
desc:
Post 2258
- All of your cards also have a <:food:1115785297721032786> card that it cycles between- you may choose which card it is when it gets eaten, played, ect.
- Whenever you eat a <:food:1115785297721032786>, gain a **Muscle**, and you don't draw any cards for eating your food.
- You may only eat one <:food:1115785297721032786> per turn.
